imdb.plot outline: Eberhard Schilling, well known presenter of SR 3 Saarlandwelle moves with camera and microphone as executor in the cities and villages in order to visit beautiful venues and interesting people. In the studio presenters Michael Friemel and Steffi Schlutter welcome two new guests - ordinary people from the country, as well as celebrities on every alternative week.
imdb.title: Wir im Saarland
plot: Eberhard Schilling, well known presenter of SR 3 Saarlandwelle moves with camera and microphone as executor in the cities and villages in order to visit beautiful venues and interesting people. In the studio presenters Michael Friemel and Steffi Schlutter welcome two new guests - ordinary people from the country, as well as celebrities on every alternative week.
